name: Damsels in Distress II
overview: Can you save the damsels in distress in this text adventure game? Melissa is here and you can talk to her any time you like. She will give you interesting messages depending on where and when you talk to her. Things here are mercurial, there are no actual objects so no inventory. Inserting a coin will work whether you have it or not. Talk to Melissa, she will guide you, she may even love you.
